title: Search the Cellar
content:
answer). For his final question, you'll have the following choices:

I'd see the ones I love. I'd look for whatever spells will rid me of this worm in my head. I'd see my enemies suffering. *[SORCERER] Nothing - you're a thing of magic. I can shatter this prison for you, if you wish.

To gain the mirror's approval, the second choice is a good one, showing that you seek survival and power. If you gave the wrong answer at any point in the conversation, the mirror will send an exploding construct
